metadata.title: A patient with severe respiratory failure caused by novel human coronavirus

abstract.original_text: We report a case of a 45-year-old patient who developed severe acute respiratory distress syndrome accompanied by renal failure. An infection with a novel human coronavirus was confirmed and found to be the reason for rapidly progressive respiratory failure of our patient.

sentences.segment_text: We report a case of a 45-year-old patient who developed severe acute respiratory distress syndrome accompanied by renal failure .
An infection with a novel human coronavirus was confirmed and found to be the reason for rapidly progressive respiratory failure of our patient .
